content.title: Kerala SIR: deadline extension brings some relief, but more time needed, say political parties
content.body: Just in: CPI(M) leader M.V. Jayarajan describes EC decision as belated wisdom at weekly review meetings on SIR chaired by Chief Electoral Officer
